Name: Betrayal of Blood: a Strength & Virtue RPG
About the game: Thallia, a 15-year old girl from the formerly prosperous family crest of Belsoon, has her world upended when her father sells her off to the Labour Force for a few measly coins. How will Thallia deal with this Betrayal of Blood? Will she stand idly by and serve out her indenture? Surely not. 'I will gain my freedom, whatever the cost.' Features: 2.5D Atmospheric RPG with charming pixel aesthetic Grounded medieval-era setting - no magic! A mix of field-overview and 1st-person dungeon-crawling gameplay modes ATB battles that encourage strategic thought utilizing different weapon and skill types No set classes - find the best weapon and armour combinations for any given situation Day/Night cycles with dynamic lighting and shadows Set within the ever-expanding canon of Strength & Virtue universe Custom key binding and controller support
